description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Hey, dude.  There are some aliens.  I guess you should shoot them.  This game is pretty short and fast paced.  New enemy types are introduced constantly, and the bosses change up the rules, so stay on your toes! AND you can play with a friend!
description.short: Hey, dude.  There are some aliens.  I guess you should shoot them.  This game is pretty short and fast paced.  New enemy types are introduced constantly, and the bosses change up the rules, so stay on your toes! AND you can play with a friend!
